name: Are you a foodie?
description: Bologna has one of the best food markets in Italy. Having one of the richest regional culinary heritages in Italy  the food market is certanly a must see. Did you know that parmiggiano, aceto balsamico and tagliatelle stem from this region? I will lead you through the cobblestone streets full of stalls with sumptuos food while explaining the culinary tradition of the area. If you want to taste or buy a mouthwatering souvenir from Bologna I will expertly guide you to the best shops. You can trust me. I live just above the market.  It doesn't metter if you're a voracious meat eater or a convinced vegan, the scents and flavours from the market will capture you.
